name: Apple 21
description: Touch ID for secure authentication and Apple Pay.

description: Memory is 8GB high-bandwidth RAM to smoothly run multiple applications and browser tabs all at once. Hard Drive  is 256GB PCIe Solid State Drive which allows to fast bootup and data transfer.

name: Laptop Acer
description: Internal Specifications: 8GB DDR4 3200MHz Memory (2 DDR4 Slots Total, Maximum 32GB); 512GB NVMe SSD (2 x PCIe M.2 Slots, 1 x 2.5 Hard Drive Bay Available).

name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S6 Lite
description: Long-lasting Battery: A long-lasting battery lets you stream for up to 13 hours, the included S Pen makes it easier than ever to write notes and personalize photos and videos, all without needing to charge.

name: Gaming PC Desktop
description: INTEL Core i7 11700F 2.5GHz (4.9GHz Max Boost) CPU Processor | 1TB NVME SSD – Up to 30x Faster Than Traditional HDD | 240mm AIO.

name: PlayStation 5 Console
description: Lightning Speed - Harness the power of a custom CPU, GPU, and SSD with Integrated I/O that rewrite the rules of what a PlayStation console can do.

name: PlayStation PS5 Console God of War Ragnarök Bundle
description: Fully optimized for 3D Audio*: Immerse yourself in the unique soundscapes of the Nine Realms as sounds reverberate and echo throughout the environment. Use highly accurate spatial audio to hear enemies approaching from any direction, including above and below you. *3D audio with stereo headphones (analog or USB).

name: Nintendo Switch OLED
description: Model w/ White Joy-Con, 64 GB internal storage - Save games to your system with 64 GB of internal storage.

name: Controller for PlayStation 4
description: The Dualshock 4 wireless controller can be easily recharged by plugging it into your PlayStation 4 system, even when in rest mode, or with any standard charger using a USB cable (type A to micro B sold separately).

name: Controller for PlayStation 5
description: Built-in microphone and headset jack - Chat with friends online using the built-in microphone or by connecting a headset to the 3.5mm jack. Easily switch voice capture on and off at a moment’s notice with the dedicated mute button. Internet and account for PlayStation Network required.

name: Mario Kart 8 Deluxe - Nintendo Switch
description: Play locally in up to 4-player multiplayer in 1080p while playing in TV Mode. Every track of the Wii U version, including DLC, makes a glorious return.

name: Super Mario Odyssey
description: Mario embarks on a new journey through the unknown, running and jumping through huge 3D worlds in the first sandbox-style Mario game since Super Mario 64 and Super Mario Sunshine.

description: Fight faster and smarter with new and returning techniques, like the perfect shield and directional air dodge.

name: Mario Party Superstars
description: Bring the party on 5 classic boards from the Nintendo 64 Mario Party games. Show your friends and family who’s boss in 100 minigames from throughout the Mario Party series.
